title: STIR FRY SOBA NOODLE & EDAMAME BOWL
directions: Heat the veggies and edamame in a pan until hot. Stir in the soy sauce, ginger, garlic and optional sesame oil. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Cook the udon noodles in a separate pot according to directions on the package. Once cooked, drain the water.
Add the noodles in with the veggies. Stir, add optional seasonings and adjust seasoning to taste.
